item.title: Airwindows Console Plugins Basics
item.description: I did a comparison of Airwindows console plugins in the last post, today I’m going to talk about how to use them. Before getting into the actual setup, let me first explain what they are and what they do. The Purpose of Airwindows Console Plugins Airwindows Console series aim to emulate the summing effect of analog console systems. Summing is what happens when two signals are combined. With digital signal, summing is simple addition.

item.title: Airwindows Console Plugins Comparison
item.description: I’ve been using Airwindows Console series since it came out as free plugins. They definitely add some gluing characters to the digital signal. Some people even go as far as saying that these sound better than “a well-known, transformer-based, Class A analog summing mixer”. Recent I figured out a more fitting way to use the console system in REAPER, and started to incorporate more of them in my template files.
